title: Never ending loading indicator is shown on white screen if open app from push notification
body:
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)

On Android: white screen with never ending loading is shown if open app from push notification. Full logcat is also attached but the cause might be this error:
```
07-10 11:27:24.792 14445 14488 E ReactNativeJS: ERROR [status-im.utils.fx:31] - Merging fx with common-keys:  #{:db :status-im.ui.screens.navigation/navigate-to}
07-10 11:27:24.893 14445 14489 E unknown:ReactNative: console.error: "ERROR [status-im.utils.fx:31] - Merging fx with common-keys:  #{:db :status-im.ui.screens.navigation/navigate-to}", stack:
```

![Screenshot_20190710-112955](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6584810/60958534-ce6ea600-a306-11e9-8666-05e2e488e0c9.png)

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)


#### Expected behavior

[comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.)
Chat with a message from contact is opened
#### Actual behavior

[comment]: # (Describe what actually happened.)
White screen with loading indicator is shown for at least 5 minutes
### Reproduction

[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- two users add each other as contacts an send some text msg in 1:1 chat
- user1 on Android closes the app
- user2 sends a text msg in 1;1 chat
- user1 gets push notification and taps on it.  Check if user1 ends up in the 1:1 chat with user2



### Additional Information

[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
- Status version: nightly from July 10
- Operating System: Android 9 (real pixel XL)

#### Logs

[comment]: # (if on Android please replicate bug whilst running adb logcat)

[not2.log](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/3376806/not2.log)

Looks like the error might be a refactoring that didn't change all occurrences of a method name:

```
07-10 11:27:24.970 14445 14488 E ReactNativeJS: 're-frame: no handler registered for effect:', { Lb: null,
07-10 11:27:24.970 14445 14488 E ReactNativeJS:   name: 'merging-fx-with-common-keys',
07-10 11:27:24.970 14445 14488 E ReactNativeJS:   R: 'merging-fx-with-common-keys',
07-10 11:27:24.970 14445 14488 E ReactNativeJS:   ge: -1375695184,
07-10 11:27:24.970 14445 14488 E ReactNativeJS:   j: 2153775105,
07-10 11:27:24.970 14445 14488 E ReactNativeJS:   P: 4096 }, '. Ignoring.'
```
Is there a @status-im/clojure dev that could look into why this navigation isn't occurring properly?
@rachelhamlin extra issue for v1 scope. Vitaliy is on it
currently blocked by https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8860 - as we stopped getting PNS at all, so can't get to the state when this #8550 can happen
